response.original_title: Lachlan's Lovely World Rebooted: Episode 2: Ratburger Revenge
response.overview: After a couple of weeks break (due to Lachlan being on holiday), the team returns with two major projects: building the rat farm and raiding Atlantis. Amidst chaotic fights (including getting caught in the driver's section of the train and beating a Holy War boss), Lachlan repeatedly turns into a vampire, desperately requiring an Altar of Cleansing to reset his levels. The team develops a complex, 'smart' rat farm mechanism involving burning the rats of wood and using steaks, resulting in what looks like "chunky cheese token[s]". The episode culminates in a dangerous attempt to capitalize off Netherite, the discovery of an elevator, and the successful catch of a "catch-a-lot whale" before Lachlan tries to put banana slugs in a monster spawner.
response.title: Lachlan's Lovely World Rebooted: Episode 2: Ratburger Revenge
